name: Warhammer Online: Return to Reckoning
description:
Make sure to follow the join us page first 
https://www.returnofreckoning.com/join.php

This is not my original work i found it on the official RoR fourms and was posted by the user Wdesu
Thank you Wdesu for your help on making the script
notes: im working on trying to get this to work

insert-disc.message: Please provide a path to your game folder (it should contain RoRLauncher.exe).

content:
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Return of Reckoning/RoRLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Return of Reckoning
installer:
- insert-disc:
    message: Please provide a path to your game folder (it should contain RoRLauncher.exe).
    requires: RoRLauncher.exe
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Return of Reckoning
    src: $DISC
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: comctl32ocx
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: comctl32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: comdlg32ocx
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2012
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: directx9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dx9_36
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dotnet40
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  env:
    CSMT: enabled
    STAGING_RT_PRIORITY_BASE: 90
    STAGING_RT_PRIORITY_SERVER: 90
    STAGING_SHARED_MEMORY: 1
    WINEARCH: win64
    WINEDEBUG: -all
    WINEDLLOVERRIDES: winemenubuilder.exe=d d3d11=
    WINEPREFIX: $GAMEDIR/prefix
  terminal: false
